default(user_id: str, income_text: str) → list[source]

Main function to interact with default text.

This function can handle the SET of:

  • Language selection

  • Bible book selection

  • Bible version selection

  • Chapter selection

  • Send a desired verse

Parameters

  • user_id (str) – ID of the user the bot is interacting with

  • income_text (str) – A str with the user’s message to be processed

Returns

List of strings with the required information
